metadata.synopsis:
Kithrak Voss, the knight hunting Lae'zel, rides in on a dragon and kills flaming fist on a bridge. Lae'zel approaches, thinking he might lead her to a creche, where she can bec ured of the tadpole.

SVoss is spoiled, intelligent, and creepily calm and fatherly: Joaquin Phoenix in Gladiator. Smarmy and evil sounding. Pronunciation: Qudenos = cue-DAY-noss. Ghaik = GAYK. Kith'rak = KITH-rack. Lae'zel = lay-ZELL. Vlaakith = VLAH-kith.

34.speaker: Lae'zel
34.text: Rider - my time is short. Lead me to...
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel begins to bow as she speaks to the kith'rak

87.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rak

74.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
74.text: Were I not merciful, I would slice the skin clean from your meat.
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rak

11.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
11.text: Yet you are not bleeding. For I am nothing if not merciful.
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rak

71.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rak

48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rak

68.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
68.context: NodeContext: zhe-STIL KITH-rack. (First consonant like the first letter of 'Jacque'.)

8.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
8.text: You will call me Jhe'stil Kith'rak.
8.context: NodeContext: zhe-STIL KITH-rack. (First consonant like the first letter of 'Jacque'.)

50.speaker: Lae'zel
50.text: Voss, Knight Supreme. The queen's silver, the queen's sword.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steals a glance to Tav, her expression tight, apprehensive. The image of her undulates slightly - a mindmeld.InternalNodeContext: This node if the 'find the weapon' beat was previously delivered by Dror Ragzlin

14.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steals a glance to Tav, her expression tight, apprehensive. The image of her undulates slightly - a mindmeld.InternalNodeContext: This node if the 'find the weapon' beat was previously delivered by Dror Ragzlin

28.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
28.text: A ghaik vessel has fallen from the sky, Lae'zel. Thieves aboard have taken a weapon most precious.
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steals a glance to Tav, her expression tight, apprehensive. The image of her undulates slightly - a mindmeld.InternalNodeContext: This node if the 'find the weapon' beat was previously delivered by Dror Ragzlin

79.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
79.text: It is polyhedric in shape, and inscribed with the sacred runes of our people.
79.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steals a glance to Tav, her expression tight, apprehensive. The image of her undulates slightly - a mindmeld.InternalNodeContext: This node if the 'find the weapon' beat was previously delivered by Dror Ragzlin

22.speaker: Player
22.text: *You feel Shadowheart's anxiety. The weapon that Voss seeks is the same one the Absolute's followers are hunting - it's the artefact that she carries.*
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steals a glance to Tav, her expression tight, apprehensive. The image of her undulates slightly - a mindmeld.InternalNodeContext: This node if the 'find the weapon' beat was previously delivered by Dror Ragzlin

49.speaker: Narrator
49.text: *You feel Shadowheart's anxiety. The weapon that Voss seeks is the same one the Absolute's followers are hunting - it's the artefact that she carries.*
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steals a glance to Tav, her expression tight, apprehensive. The image of her undulates slightly - a mindmeld.InternalNodeContext: This node if the 'find the weapon' beat was previously delivered by Dror Ragzlin

40.speaker: Narrator
40.text: *You feel Shadowheart's anxiety. The weapon that Voss seeks - it's the artefact that she carries.*
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steals a glance to Tav, her expression tight, apprehensive. The image of her undulates slightly - a mindmeld.

9.speaker: Narrator
9.text: *Her mind focuses - the giths' suspicion cannot be aroused. They cannot discover that the weapon they seek is right within their grasp.*
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's eyes flick over to the hobgoblin.

60.speaker: Lae'zel
60.text: Take word to your crèche. You are to join our search.
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Pause after the line. Camera shows Lae'zel for a second or so. She is still bowed, silent, frowning.|

56.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
56.text: Take word to your crèche. You are to join our search.
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Pause after the line. Camera shows Lae'zel for a second or so. She is still bowed, silent, frowning.|

18.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
18.text: Speak up, child. Affirm your mandate.
18.context: NodeContext: Snotty and confident, stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rak zhe-STIL KITH-rack. (First consonant like the first letter of 'Jacque'.)

91.speaker: Player
91.text: Mouth a silent command to Lae'zel: 'truth'.
91.context: NodeContext: Snotty and confident, stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rak zhe-STIL KITH-rack. (First consonant like the first letter of 'Jacque'.)

61.speaker: Lae'zel
61.text: My mandate, Jhe'stil Kith'rak, is to locate this crèche. I was infected aboard a ghaik ship and need to be purified. Your mandate is to aid me.
61.context: NodeContext: Snotty and confident, stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rak zhe-STIL KITH-rack. (First consonant like the first letter of 'Jacque'.)

33.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
33.text: Purified? Soon, your skin will go grey, and your blood will run silver. You will shed your skin to become ghaik.

7.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
7.text: Only in death are the infected cleansed.

32.text: Baretha, see that her skull is split and the tadpole crushed. Then examine her corpse. I will take word to the Undying Queen - our search continues.

15.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
15.text: Baretha, see that her skull is split and the tadpole crushed. Then examine her corpse. I will take word to the Undying Queen - our search continues.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: *A current of deception carries Voss' words. Wherever he flies, it is not to Vlaakith.*

89.text: *A current of deception carries Voss' words. Wherever he flies, it is not to Vlaakith.*

73.speaker: Narrator
73.text: *A current of deception carries Voss' words. Wherever he flies, it is not to Vlaakith.*

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Mouth a silent command to Lae'zel: 'play along'.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rakNodeContext: Barely holding back contempt

41.text: You honour me with this duty, Kith'rak. I shall alert my caretaker with haste.
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rakNodeContext: Barely holding back contempt

59.speaker: Lae'zel
59.text: You honour me with this duty, Kith'rak. I shall alert my caretaker with haste.
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rakNodeContext: Barely holding back contempt

42.speaker: Player
42.text: *The Kith'rak nods, content with Lae'zel's answer.*
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Kithrak voss should nod here.

62.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
62.text: *The Kith'rak nods, content with Lae'zel's answer.*
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Kithrak voss should nod here.

52.speaker: Narrator
52.text: *The Kith'rak nods, content with Lae'zel's answer.*
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: Kithrak voss should nod here.

3.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
3.text: You serve your queen well, child. Take your slaves, and hunt those who escaped the ghaik ship. They must carry the weapon.

37.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
37.text: I fly now to Vlaakith, our Undying Queen. She will see your faith rewarded in this plane and ours.

31.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
31.text: You serve your queen well, child. Hunt those who escaped the ghaik ship. Find the weapon.

38.text: Lae'zel. Child. Your lies sting. Has Vlaakith not demanded better?
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rakNodeContext: Contemptuous,

63.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
63.text: Lae'zel. Child. Your lies sting. Has Vlaakith not demanded better?
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rakNodeContext: Contemptuous,

44.speaker: Lae'zel
44.text: Vlaakith demands my purity, Kith'rak. I was infected aboard a ghaik ship. By protocol you must aid me.
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rakNodeContext: Contemptuous,

23.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
23.text: You were on the nautiloid? Then you are a ghaik wearing githyanki skin.
23.context: NodeContext: looks up from bowing as she speaks

13.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
13.text: Bend your head for the sword.
13.context: NodeContext: looks up from bowing as she speaks

86.speaker: Lae'zel
86.text: I have done no wrong, kith'rak.
86.context: NodeContext: looks up from bowing as she speaks

90.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
90.text: Baretha, see that her skull is split and her corpse examined, on Vlaakith's command. I will take word to the Undying Queen - our search continues.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: Produce the odd artefact. You're looking for this, I take it?
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel looks up from bowing at the player in anger

88.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
88.text: Our thieves come forth, Baretha. Did you imagine such fortune?
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel looks up from bowing at the player in anger

20.speaker: Lae'zel
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel looks up from bowing at the player in anger

45.text: You will give us the weapon. Then you will bend your head for the sword.

1.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
1.text: You will give us the weapon. Then you will bend your head for the sword.

16.speaker: Lae'zel
16.text: I have done no wrong. Vlaakith demands my purity, Kith'rak. I was infected aboard the ghaik ship. By protocol, you must aid me.

4.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
4.text: Baretha, see that her skull is split and the weapon collected. I will take word to Queen Vlaakith - our quest has ended.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: I have my own mandate. Time to die, gith.
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel looks up from bowing at the player in anger

77.speaker: Lae'zel
77.text: What? Half-wit! I have not suffered for you to deny me!
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel looks up from bowing at the player in anger

64.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
64.text: You do not control your slaves?

2.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
2.text: Baretha - see their skulls split and their corpses examined, on Vlaakith's command.

85.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
85.text: I will take word to Queen Vlaakith - our search continues.

36.speaker: Narrator
36.text: *You realise that the weapon Voss speaks of is the gith artefact you carry. You must keep it from him, just as you must keep it from the Absolute.*
36.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the 'find the weapon' beat was previously delivered by Dror Ragzlin

29.speaker: Narrator
29.text: *You realise that the weapon Voss speaks of is the gith artefact you carry. You cannot let him discover it - no matter what.*
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player glances to their side, as if sensing the box

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *You suddenly feel a strange anxiety take hold - not your own, but that of the artefact you carry. Somehow, it's afraid...*
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player glances to their side, as if sensing the box

53.speaker: Narrator
53.text: *You attune your mind to it. The artefact does not want to fall into the gith raiders' hands any more than it does the Absolute followers'.*
53.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the 'find the weapon' beat was previously delivered by Dror Ragzlin

84.speaker: Narrator
84.text: *You attune your mind to it. The artefact does not want to part from you. It does not want to fall into the gith raiders' hands.*

72.speaker: Player
72.text: I will be speaking on my kin's behalf, Kith'rak.
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel looks up from bowing at the player in anger

30.speaker: Player
30.text: I will be speaking on her behalf, gith.
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel looks up from bowing at the player in anger

25.speaker: Lae'zel
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel looks up from bowing at the player in anger

26.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
26.text: Now, now - Vlaakith esteems all her children. What say you, githyanki?

47.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
47.text: Now, now - I would hear from all dwellers of remote planes. What say you?

70.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
70.text: Now, now - I've few chances to speak to such an unusual sort. What say you?

19.speaker: Player
19.text: I will be speaking on her behalf, gith.
